channel.title: Celina Kay Porter
channel.description: Recent content on Celina Kay Porter

item.title: Black
item.description: A collection dedicated to the people who think everything should be made in Black.

item.title: Bloom
item.description: A retrospective collection. This collection combines pieces from each of the fashion shows produced over the past two years.

item.title: About Celina Kay Porter
item.description: Thanks for dropping by, let me tell you about myself!

item.title: Shows
item.description: SS16 - Vancouver Fashion Week, Vancouver Canada Upcoming show. If you would like to help, you can donate at www.gofundme.com/CelinaKayPorter. 2014 - Harwood Museum of Art, Taos, NM Exhibited original designs, created from scratch, based on the Fibonacci Sequence, In the Sacred Geo Show. 2013 - El Monte Sagrado, Taos, NM Produced a fashion show titled “Hanbok to K-Pop”. Exhibited original designs, created from scratch. In these designs, I explored the evolution of fashion in Korea.
